Documentation: Strategy for registration of the batch in the GUI. Only relevant for dialogs of the domains inventory and stock adjustment.
Other End (assortment): Optional grouping of an item.
Is part of the unique identification of a quantity unit.
Specifies the value (or amount) in the duration unit entered by the user.
Other End (unit): Defines the duration unit in which this value (triple) was entered by a user.
The variant is the most precise description of an item. With the help of the variant, e.g. colours or sizes of clothing can be specified. Is a part of the unique identification of an item.
Is a part of the unique identification of an item.
